project.name: Rat Trap Chair
project.description: Customizable flat folding chair made out of wood
project.presentation: This is a small multilayer flat folding chair. The idea consists in a wooden hinge based chair that is fully customizable through a set of parameters provided within this model page

variable.name: fullSeatHeight
variable.description: The height of the seat. In millimeters

variable.name: fullSeatLength
variable.description: The length of the seat. In millimeters

variable.name: fullSeatwidth
variable.description: The width of the seat. In millimeters

variable.name: fullUpright
variable.description: The upright of the chair. In millimeters

variable.name: alphaDeg
variable.description: The angle of the back of the chair (regarding vertical line). In degrees
